item.title: Cleaning Credit Score Classification Dataset
item.description: Profession photo created by freepik - freepik.com Disclaimer: I’ll be talking about how to come up with the python code, if you want to read the actual code please go to this repo. Meet the Credit Score Classification Dataset The dataset that we’ll clean comes from kaggle, which is the train.csv dataset, but this could be used for the test.csv as well. There are 28 columns and 100k rows in this dataset.
